Home_Description: I am a software developer specialized in web and mobile application development. I develop user-friendly, modern and high-performance applications.
Home_SkillsSubtitle: Technologies I use in development processes
Contact_GetInTouch: Questions or projects? You can reach me
Contact_SendMessageDescription: You can write to me about your projects or questions. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
About_Subtitle: Full Stack Developer | .NET Enthusiast | Problem Solver
About_Description: I am competent in software development and algorithm design; I have developed projects with ASP.NET Core MVC, C# and Python. I am solution-oriented and continuously improve my technical skills.
About_Reference_1_Title: Software Unit Manager - Bilge Adam Academy
About_ProfessionalSummaryText1: I have a strong background in software development, algorithm design, and problem-solving. I have developed projects in ASP.NET Core MVC, C#, and Python; I have experience in web and mobile application development. I continuously improve my technical competence with my interest in database design and different technologies.
About_ProfessionalSummaryText2: I have a good level of English knowledge. I focus on producing effective solutions to the problems I encounter in a solution-oriented and determined manner.
About_Experience_1_Desc1: I have been working as a freelance web developer since August 2025.
About_Experience_1_Desc2: I performed theme and plugin customization, maintenance, and performance optimization in several WordPress projects.
About_Experience_1_Desc3: I took part in numerous React projects; I focused especially on bug fixing and performance optimization.
About_Experience_2_Desc1: Along with C# and OOP fundamentals, I gained experience in .NET 6/7/8, Entity Framework Core, LINQ, MVC, and Web API.
About_Experience_2_Desc2: I learned to effectively use design patterns such as Singleton, Repository, and Unit of Work with SOLID principles.
About_Experience_2_Desc3: I performed database operations using MSSQL and T-SQL.
About_Experience_2_Desc4: I gained basic interface development knowledge with HTML5, CSS3, and Bootstrap; I carried out my work in accordance with Agile and Scrum methodologies.
About_Experience_3_Desc1: I developed C# applications that perform tasks such as internet connection control, process termination, and logging using Windows services.
About_Experience_3_Desc2: I created a modern web application including functions such as user login/registration, password reset, and email verification using ASP.NET MVC and Bootstrap.
About_Experience_4_Desc1: An authentication system was developed using Token Based Authentication and ASP.NET Web API. Web API installation, OWIN configuration, token generation, MD5 encryption, and database connection with Entity Framework were made.
About_Experience_4_Desc2: A SQL database structure containing user roles was designed and integrated into the project. Connection was provided with Entity Framework, tests were carried out using Postman and AJAX/JQuery.
About_TechnologiesDescription: I work with modern and reliable technologies. I am constantly learning new technologies and improving myself.
Projects_Subtitle: Projects developed with creative solutions and innovative approaches
Projects_NoProjectsDescription: New projects will be added soon.
Footer_AboutText: I continue to learn new technologies and improve myself.
